Module lanat
Package lanat

Class ArgumentBuilder<Type extends ArgumentType<TInner>,TInner>

java.lang.Object
lanat.ArgumentBuilder<Type,TInner>
Type Parameters:
Type - the ArgumentType subclass that will parse the value passed to the argument
TInner - the actual type of the value passed to the argument
All Implemented Interfaces:
Builder<Argument<Type,TInner>>
public class ArgumentBuilder<Type extends ArgumentType<TInner>,TInner> extends Object implements Builder<Argument<Type,TInner>>
Provides easy ways to build an Argument.

  • Method Details

    • getArgumentTypeFromField

      @Nullable public static @Nullable ArgumentType<?> getArgumentTypeFromField(@NotNull @NotNull Field field)
      Returns an ArgumentType instance based on the specified field. If the annotation specifies a type, it will be used. Otherwise, the type will be inferred from the field type. If the type cannot be inferred, null will be returned. Note: Expects the field to be annotated with Argument.Define
      Parameters:
      field - the field that will be used to build the argument
      Returns:
      the built argument type

    • fromField

      @NotNull public static <Type extends ArgumentType<TInner>, TInner> @NotNull ArgumentBuilder<Type,TInner> fromField(@NotNull @NotNull Field field)
      Builds an Argument from the specified field annotated with Argument.Define. Note that this doesn't set the argument type. Use setTypeFromField(Field) for that.
      Type Parameters:
      Type - the ArgumentType subclass that will parse the value passed to the argument
      TInner - the actual type of the value passed to the argument
      Parameters:
      field - the field that will be used to build the argument
      Returns:
      the built argument

    • fromField

      @NotNull public static <Type extends ArgumentType<TInner>, TInner> @NotNull ArgumentBuilder<Type,TInner> fromField(@NotNull @NotNull Class<? extends CommandTemplate> templateClass, @NotNull @NotNull String fieldName)
      Builds an Argument from the specified field name in the specified CommandTemplate subclass.
      Type Parameters:
      Type - the ArgumentType subclass that will parse the value passed to the argument
      TInner - the actual type of the value passed to the argument
      Parameters:
      templateClass - the CommandTemplate subclass that contains the field
      fieldName - the name of the field that will be used to build the argument
      Returns:
      the built argument

    • type

      public ArgumentBuilder<Type,TInner> type(@NotNull Type argType)
      The Argument Type is the class that will be used to parse the argument value. It handles the conversion from the input string to the desired type.
      Parameters:
      argType - the argument type that will be used to parse the argument value

    • build

      @NotNull public @NotNull Argument<Type,TInner> build()
      Builds the argument.
      Specified by:
      build in interface Builder<Type extends ArgumentType<TInner>>
      Returns:
      the built argument
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the argument doesn't have at least one name or if the type is not defined
